1.content: You encounter a bright light and pass out. You wake up the next Day to find out that you have the power to swap any thing with anyone. You are eager to test it out. What do you want to swap first?
1.title: The Swapping Power

13.content:
You walk downstairs thinking about what you will swap first. You settle on experimenting a little. You decide to swap roles with someone.
         You enter the kitchen to see your older sister Alex eating breakfast. Your brother has yet to awake. You hear the doorbell ring and it is your girlfriend Janey. Your mom is doing laundry and your dad is at work. Who do you want to swap with?
13.title: Role

131.content:
You focus a little before opening the door. You think about swapping roles with Janey. You open the door and are immediately pulled into a passionate kiss. You feel Janey caressing and squeezing your butt the way you usually do to her. When finally release from the kiss and Janey says, “Hey JJ Baby. You want to go out?”
         You hesitate as you realize that she called you by the nickname you use for her. You begin to realize that she is treating you like you’re her girlfriend and realize that she is now your boyfriend. She continues to hold you the way you used to do to her. You agree to go out. Where do you go?
131.title: Janey (Girlfriend)

choices: Actually buy the popcorn and go back
Try to avoid your horny girlfriend
1312.content:
You frowned as you saw the line to get into the cinema was unprecedentedly longer than you thought it would be. You checked your phone: it was already 6:45PM. You were considering just abandoning the trip when you felt a sharp pinch on your backside. You yelped as you turned around to see your girlfriend with a playful smile plastered on her pretty face. She leaned in closer and pulled you into a tight embrace, standing on her tiptoes to plant a wet kiss on your forehead as she whispered, "Jakey, I have to admit I'm not just here for the MOVIE, if you know what I mean."

You gulped down hard. Yeah, getting steamy on a movie date with a girl was definitely on your bucket list but something about seeing your girlfriend acting like this unnerved you. "Uh, s-sure, y-yeah," you stammered, "Just let m-me get some p-popcorn first!" You calmly repositioned one of your girlfriend's straying hand (which had been reaching up to pet the confused boner in his pants) as you walked away and disappeared into the crowd.

Phew, you gasped as you wiped away a bead of sweat. On one hand you were relieved that you'd gotten away from your lustful lover but on the other you were cursing yourself at passing at the chance to get laid with his girlfriend. You decided to take your mind off the situation by focusing on your recently acquired powers again. The role swap with Janey had obviously worked and he was eager to experiment some more.

He looked over and spotted a middle aged father with wild, red hair and a scraggly looking beard walking hand-in-hand with his preteen daughter. The girl had pretty blonde hair tied into a high ponytail and was wearing a grimy pink frock with black and white leggings and cute looking ballet flats. As a test you decided to imagine the two changing places, not necessarily in the roles but physically this time.

You opened your eyes and had to stifle a laugh as you looked at the hilarious scene you'd just created. The middle-aged-father now had to look up to his daughter due to his diminutive height. He'd kept his wild, red hair and beard but they now sat on the daughter's petite face. You could tell that he was struggling to restrain his daughter now that she towered over him. The girl dragged her father over to the screening of a popular vampire flick that had just come out and she was pleading desperately on her knees, a gesture that just looked downright comical.

"So I can do more than just told swals, huh?" you said in your mind. You decided to...
1312.title: Movies

14.content:
You wake up to find no one at home. When you go down, you see a note on the kitchen counter from your mom saying that she noticed that you were sick and called the school to say that you wouldn’t come today.

You decide to go to the mall where you find many people. Of all the people you find the following people the most interesting to swap with.

14.title: Body Part

141.content: You notice Sam in the corner or your eye. You then realize that Sam is a pregnant teenager WITH TWINS. You subconsciously wonder what it would be like to be pregnant. What happens?
141.title: Sam

145.title: Someone Else

info.brief_description: You gain the ability to swap anything with anyone and swaps not including yourself.
info.description:
Your name is Jake O'Donnell and you are 15. When you encounter a mysterious light you pass out and dream that you have the ability to swap anything with anyone. When you awake, you are no longer outside, you are back home in bed. You soon realize that you really can make swaps.

Types of Swaps:
- Body Swap
- Gender Swap
- Body Part Swap
- Clothes Swap
- Role Swap
- Age Swap
- Mental Trait Swap

Rules:
- Sex is allowed, no incest.
- Reality changes every time you swap, unless you specifically say it doesn’t.
- Try to keep it consistent.

Characters:

- Janey Ottar — Your girlfriend. She is beautiful. She has long brown hair, B Cup breasts, she is athletic and plays field hockey. She is a little bit of a tomboy, but is well balanced between being a girl and tomboy.

- Andrew Nactun — Your best friend. He is not very athletic, but is one of the smartest people you know.

- Casey O’Donnell — Your Brother
